Interface_name: HTTP client using cURL in PHP
Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a PHP class for interacting with Google Drive API using OAuth 2.0 authentication and cURL for HTTP requests.

Class Description: The Googledrive class provides functionality to authenticate with Google Drive API and make authorized API requests. It handles OAuth 2.0 token management and provides a method for making API calls.

Attributes:

access_token: string - The OAuth 2.0 access token for API authentication
disktag: string - Identifier for the disk configuration
client_id: string - Google API client ID
client_secret: string - Google API client secret
redirect_uri: string - OAuth redirect URI
oauth_url: string - Google OAuth endpoint URL
api_url: string - Google Drive API endpoint URL
scope: string - API access scope
driveId: string - Google Drive ID
error: array - Stores error information if any occurs

Methods:

__construct: [Name](tag: string) -> void - Constructor that initializes the class with configuration values
GDAPI: [Name](method: string, url: string, data: string = '') -> array - Makes an authenticated API request to Google Drive
get_access_token: [Name](refresh_token: string) -> bool - Retrieves and manages access tokens using refresh tokens
